Text: I have been busy talking to voters from across District 17.  From Sewickley‚Äôs Night Market to my son‚Äôs baseball game vs Riverside (Beaver County) to meeting friends from Oakmont and Verona it has been great talking with people about ways to move our country forward! https://t.co/wmWbqHp8BH

‚Ä¶ Pittsburgh used to be ranked #3 in the US for corporate HQs just behind NY and Chicago.  When the HQ leaves the focus will inevitably shift over time and both investments and local philanthropy dwindles.  I will work with business and labor to advance our region!

Western PA is one of the best places to live and raise a family. We need leaders who will fight for our region and encourage a positive business environment.  The announcement by ATI moving its HQ to Texas is bad news for our region.  We have seen this story before (1/2)

We were happy to support the historic Burtner House‚Äôs annual Strawberry Festival this past weekend.  There is so much history here in Western PA to learn about and enjoy.  Thank you to all those keeping it alive and telling the story to the next generation. https://t.co/ujoWgFdAMj
